keys: ion de complexe en métal de transition
íon do complexo do metal da transição
ione del complesso del metallo di transizione
ion del complejo del metal de la transición
resource_data:

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_53a34a84d80af700d97f4a8823e508ab95f25929</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_53a34a84d80af700d97f4a8823e508ab95f25929</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Visible spectra of transition metal complex ions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtbare Spektren der Übergang 
Metallkomplexionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éventails visibles des ions de complexe en 
métal de transition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Spectra visíveis de íons do complexo do metal 
da transição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gamme visibili di ioni del complesso del metallo 
di transizione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ορατά φάσματα των σύνθετων ιόντων μετάλλων μετάβασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espectros visibles de los iones del complejo del 
metal de la transición</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is second of four graphs showing the visible absorption spectra used for an exercise on predicting the colour of transition metal complex ions. Here, the absorption spectrum of chromium complex ion is shown.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">complex colour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">relative light absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transition metal complex ion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">visible absorption spectra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses liegt an zweiter Stelle bei vier 
Diagrammen, welche die sichtbaren Absorptionsspektren zeigen, die für
eine Übung auf dem Voraussagen der Farbe der Übergang 
Metallkomplexionen verwendet werden. Hier wird das 
Absorptionsspektrum des komplizierten Ions des Chroms gezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est en second lieu de quatre graphiques 
montrant les spectres d'absorption visibles utilisés pour un exercice
sur prévoir la couleur des ions de complexe en métal de transition. 
Ici, le spectre d'absorption de l'ion complexe de chrome est 
montré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto é em segundo de quatro gráficos que 
mostram os spectra de absorption visíveis usados para um exercício 
em predizer a cor de íons do complexo do metal da transição. 
Aqui, o spectrum de absorption do íon complexo do cromo é 
mostrado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è in secondo luogo di quattro grafici che 
mostrano gli spettri di assorbimento visibili usati per 
un'esercitazione sulla predizione del colore degli ioni del complesso 
del metallo di transizione. Qui, lo spettro di assorbimento 
dello ione complesso del bicromato di potassio è indicato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι δεύτερη τεσσάρων γραφικών παραστάσεων που
εμφανίζουν ορατά φάσματα απορρόφησης που χρησιμοποιούνται για μια
άσκηση στην πρόβλεψη του χρώματος των σύνθετων ιόντων μετάλλων 
μετάβασης. Εδώ, το φάσμα απορρόφησης του σύνθετου ιόντος 
χρωμίου εμφανίζεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto está en segundo lugar de cuatro gráficos 
que muestran los espectros de absorción visibles usados para un 
ejercicio en predecir el color de los iones del complejo del metal de 
la transición. Aquí, el espectro de absorción de ión 
complejo del cromo se muestra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">komplizierte Farbe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">relative Lichtabsorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übergang Metallkomplexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sichtbare Absorptionsspektren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellenlänge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">couleur complexe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">absorption de la lumière relative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ion de complexe en métal de transition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">spectres d'absorption visibles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">longueur d'onde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cor complexa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">íon do complexo do metal da transição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">spectra de absorption visíveis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύνθετο χρώμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχετική ελαφριά απορρόφηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύνθετο ιόν μετάλλων μετάβασης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
